resources.string: We use your location to show your nearest station, give directions and so you can start the pump and pay for fuel through the app.
Welcome to Petro-Canada on the go!
Sign in or join to favourite
Sorry, we can\'t find any results
Try expanding your search or removing filters.
Remember to be responsible. Please don\'t use your phone while driving.
Please try again. If you recently created an account, check your inbox for your verification link.
%1d attempts left before the app gets locked for %2d mins
Sign in is locked due to %1d failed attempts.\nRetry in %2d minutes.
You\'ve entered the wrong security answer too many times. Please try again in 30 minutes.
You entered the wrong security answer too many times. Please wait X minutes before trying to sign in.
Try again later. If you recently created an account, check your inbox for your verification link.
You can use Favourites to quickly find the car wash you love or that store with your favourite slush flavour.
Sign in to your Petro-Points account to access all features, including favourites.
Do you have a \n Petro\u2011Points card?
You can use your points for dollars off fuel, car wash, or store purchases.
No, I don\'t have a card.
Your app is outdated. To join the program, please download the newest version.
Your app is outdated. To update your info, please download the newest version.
Yes, I\'d like to receive news, offers and partner discounts from Petro-Points.
You can unsubscribe at any time.
I\'d like to use Touch ID to sign in
Use Touch ID to sign in, authorize purchases, reload your Petro-Canada cards and more.
By creating an account, I agree to the Petro-Points terms and conditions
Let\'s get you signed up. Plus, collect 2,500 Petro-Points.
The details you\'ve entered won\'t be saved if you leave. Leave the Create Account form?
Please enter a valid phone number (e.g. 416-123-4567)
The postal code you entered isn\'t valid.
Please enter a different email address or Call 1-800-668-0220 if you have any issues.
Please enter a valid email address.
This email already has an account.
If you don\'t remember your password, submit a password reset.
Something went wrong on our side
The card number you entered is incorrect.
The postal code you entered isn\'t valid.
Postal code does not match the province selected.
We can\'t seem to load your favourites right now.
Address suggestions are not available at the moment.
The Petro-Points card number, the postal code, or name are incorrect.
This card is already associated with a Petro-Points account. Sign in or use a different card.
If you need help, please call Customer Service.
You\'ve been signed out due to a change in your account details.
Your sign-in was used on another device. Please sign-in again.
Your new password can\'t be the same as your temporary password.
Almost there. Complete your registration and receive 2,500 points.
We couldn\'t locate the nearest station at the moment.
We couldn\'t locate the nearest station at the moment, please try again later.
Petro-Canada uses locations services to show relevant information for you.
Need help? Get in touch with us.
Register your Petro-Canada cards to protect your balance and access key features.
Our Fuel Savings Rewards card helps you save %d¢ per litre on 200 litres of fuel.\n\u2014\nReload your card at petro-points.com.
Use at participating GlideWash and SuperWash locations.
Wash your car once every day for 90 days. Use at participating GlideWash and SuperWash locations.
Save on fuel every time your swipe your Preferred Price card.
Our RBC–Petro‑Canada program helps you save on fuel and earn points faster.
You can also exchange your points for CAA Dollars or a new 1-year basic CAA Membership.
You can also exchange your points for CAA Dollars.
You\'re also collecting 20% more Hudson\'s Bay Rewards points on purchases at Hudson\'s Bay and thebay.com.
You\'re collecting 1 More Rewards point for every $1 spent at our Petro‑Canada locations.
Enter the number located on the front or back of your card.
Enter the security code located on the back of your card.
Enter the activation code (AC#) located on the back of your card.
Please enter a valid card number.
Your security code is a 3 digit number located on the back of your card.
We couldn\'t validate your card details. Please check that the details entered are correct.
Please note, in order to protect your account, if you change your email address you will not be able to redeem points online or in-store for 24 hours.
Changing your email will automatically log you out, require you to verify your new address and you will be unable to receive an eGift card redemption for 24 hours.
You’ve already started an online account with this card. Check your inbox for your verification link or call customer service.
Please enter a valid email address.
Please enter a valid phone number (e.g. 416–123-4567)

Changing your info will require you to sign in again. If you\'ve changed your email, check your inbox to verify your email address.

We want to help keep your information safe. Answer your security question to continue.
You may have changed your sign in details recently. Please sign in again to continue.
Choose a value, confirm redemption and get the eGift card in your email.
Use at any Cineplex theatre or online at cineplex.com. \n
Use at any WINNERS, HomeSense or Marshalls in Canada. \n
Use at over 10 Canadian restaurants like Montana\'s, East Side Mario\'s and Swiss Chalet. \n
Use at Hudson\'s Bay and online at thebay.com. \n
Choose a value, confirm redemption and get the eGift card in your email.
If you changed your email address and then redeem for an eGift card, you will not be able to redeem points online or in-store for 24 hours.
Transactions are irreversible. By selecting \"confirm and redeem,\" you agree to Terms and conditions.
Not enough points yet. Keep saving.
Check your email for a link to your eGift card.
You cannot redeem for this item at this time. If this issue continues, contact customer service at 1 (800) 668-0220 (TTY: 1 (888) 290-7377).
Balance may take up to 24 hours to update
Select a card to get started.
Select your car wash ticket to get started.
Select your car wash card or ticket to get started.
Add your car wash card to your wallet or purchase a ticket in store.
Type the digits shown on the car wash screen.
We\'ll be able to activate the car wash once you\'ve typed the code shown on the car wash screen.
Hold your barcode up to the scanner.
This is an independently owned car wash
Petro-Canada car wash cards and tickets can\'t be used at this location. Purchase a ticket in-store to wash your car.
No problem. Enter your email and we\'ll help you set up a new one.
Enter your new Petro-Points password below.
If you changed your email in the last 24 hours, there will be a hold on redeemed Single-Ticket tickets
Transactions are irreversible. By selecting \"confirm and redeem,\" you agree to Terms and conditions.
Add your ticket to your account to access at a later date.
Scan your ticket at any participating GlideWash or SuperWash location.
Scan your ticket at any participating GlideWash or SuperWash location.
Having trouble scanning? \nTry typing your ticket number into the car wash screen.
Looks like your card is running on empty. Reload on petro-canada.ca or get a car wash ticket in store.
Looks like your card is running on empty. Don\'t worry – you have other options in your account.
Contactless payment and fuelling with your app
Add a credit card to your account for a faster experience.
Pay at the pump through the app with this credit card.
Are you sure you want to remove this card from your account?
Removes the card from your account.
Fuelling your vehicle is fast and easy.
You can\’t use your app to pay at this station.
Your pump number is on the top or the side of the pump.
By pressing \"Confirm and authorize\", you agree to our Legal and Privacy policies.
Please lift the nozzle and select a fuel grade
Share your receipt below and access your purchase info from your account. Your Petro-Points may take up to 24 hours to appear.
Your purchase info will be available from your account. Or, grab your receipt from the pump or in-store.
Select another pump to fuel your vehicle.
We had trouble processing your payment.
You can start another fill through the app or at the pump.
Your transaction was cancelled. You have not been charged.
You\'ll need to enable location services to pay at the pump.
You\'ll need to turn on your location to pay at the pump.
By pressing \"Confirm and pay\", you agree to our Terms and Conditions.
This card is no longer valid. New cards can be purchased on our website or in-store.
Thanks, %1$s! Squeaky-clean is coming right up.
Follow the car wash instructions and enjoy your wash.
You\’re out of washes. Reload your card on Petro-Canada.ca.
You\’re out of days. Reload your card on Petro-Canada.ca.
Suds! Something went wrong. Try again or contact the in-store attendant.
This card is no longer valid. New cards can be purchased on our website or in-store.
To protect your data, permissions for this app will be removed if the app isn\'t used for a few months
Redeem your Petro-Points for free gas, eGift, cards and more.
Scan your card in store to earn or redeem points. Or, download our app to earn points directly at the pump.
By using this pass, you agree to the Petro Points terms and conditions. Read them on our website.
Échangez vos Petro-Points pour obtenir de l\'essence gratuite, des cartes-cadeaux électroniques et plus encore.

Obtenez :
1 L = 10 points
1 $ = 10 points

Échangez :
1 000 = 1 $ de rabais
Scannez votre carte au dépanneur pour obtenir ou échanger des points. Ou téléchargez notre application pour obtenir des points directement à la pompe.
En utilisant cette carte, vous acceptez les conditions de Petro-Points. Consultez-les sur notre site Web.
